name: Bing to Ecosia
description: Bing to Ecosia combined with Edge deflector ( https://github.com/da2x/EdgeDeflector ) lets you search privately through cortana tool bar with Ecosia instead of Bing. This Tool is powered by Louis Grasset's Addon: bing-to-duckduckgo ( https://gitlab.com/louisgrasset/bing-to-duckduckgo ). All grades goes to him.
author: Anneres Diderich <andreas@tnoob.de> (tnoob.de)
